content.query:
COPY INTO dbo.Sales
FROM 'https://ugosynapse2.blob.core.windows.net/csvfile/sales.csv'
WITH (
FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Shared Access Signature', 
SECRET='sp=racwmeo&st=2025-05-18T19:12:13Z&se=2025-05-24T03:12:13Z&spr=https&sv=2024-11-04&sr=c&sig=nKQRBUo6zjLwdZ8dHrIEfdNieyPil%2FtZ5gj77mRsQLs%3D'),
FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0A',
FIRSTROW = 2
);

SELECT * FROM Sales
